alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 8:30PM CST until March 16 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi affecting White, Wayne and Gallatin Counties. .Due to recent heavy rainfall, the Little Wabash River at Carmi is in minor flooding. It is forecast to remain nearly steady through the weekend, then slowly fall, dropping below flood stage next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, The inundation of county roads begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 29.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise very slightly to a crest of 29.3 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
